Description: 
---------------- 
Enter the ring for this entry 2011 in the franchise king boxing knockout. Fight Night champion is to define a new standard in sports games by delivering more dynamic simulation of fighting experience to date, pushing the visual boundaries and redefine the journey of a single player in the category. 

With a sophisticated animation system based on physical features improved locomotion, drilling and mechanical resistance, Fight Night Champion allow users to move, attack and dodge with speed and power of the best champions, contenders and pretenders in the world of boxing. In addition, a new control system (called Full Spectrum Control Punch) will deliver the most realistic drilling system ever seen in a fighting game simulation, while still providing access experience for all players. And Fight Night Champion breaks the mold of what is expected in a sports game for one player. Players will be introduced in an entirely new way to step through the ropes and experience the drama, excitement, emotion and tragedy of World Championship Boxing
